title: Camnitz AB 460, Willetts, Willetts & Collins - SOLD
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Camnitz AB 460, Willetts, Willetts & Collins - SOLD
posts.post_content:
Four cards are offered.

1.  Howie Camnitz - Arm Down - American Beauty 460 reverse - BVG 2.5 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10081/camnitz-arm-down-ab[/IMG]

2.  Ed Willetts - Pitching - Piedmont 350/460 reverse - SGC 60 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/33806/willetts-pitching[/IMG]

3.  Ed Willetts - Pitching - Piedmont 350 reverse - BVG 3.5 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10234/willett-pitching[/IMG]

4.  Eddie Collins - HOF - Sweet Cap 350 Fact 25 VA - SGC 30 - $OLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/19206/collins-eddie-hof[/IMG]

All prices include shipping and all prices are net to me.
PM sent - BTW, three cards offered or four?
Damn, I'm sorry I missed that Camnitz! That's one of my back runs!
